+202-2358-5911 admins@mceducation.org
MCS | Location
  • About
  • Admissions
  • Location
  • Employment
  • Give

Directions

 

If coming by metro:

Get off at El Maadi.  If coming from Cairo you need to exit immediately, if coming from the South then cross the bridge before you exit the station. Turn left onto Street 9 and walk north for two blocks. Turn right on Street 77 and then take the second left on Street 11. MCS is on the left with a blue steel gate.

 

If coming by car:

  1. Once in Maadi ask directions for Midan Sawaris towards the area called Hadeyek El Maadi.







Midan Sawaris is a roundabout/circle with fountains by the Maadi Club.
Take the road off the Midan called Sharaa Dameshk, this is the road BEFORE the Corniche bridge road, look down it and youâ€™ll see a big sign for Eye Care Centre.
As you go down Sharaa Dameshk pass Eye Care Centre on the right.
Then Pace De Luca Beauty Salon on the left
Go straight through a small junction
On the left you will see shops called Plaza Cafe
After these shops take the next tiny street to the left
Park on this street.
MCS is the second building on the right, it is a three story white building with blue shutters and there is a blue steel gate with a small white MCS sign on it.
